Random Intercept Cross-Lagged Panel Model (RI-CLPM)

Three Time Points with Equality Constraints

üìã Model Components

‚óè
Random Intercept (RI_cause): Stable between-person differences in cause variable
‚óè
Random Intercept (RI_effect): Stable between-person differences in effect variable
‚Üí
Autoregressive paths (a, b): Stability of within-person deviations over time
‚Üí
Cross-lagged paths (c): Causal effect from cause to effect (main interest)
‚á¢
Cross-lagged paths (d): Reverse causal effect from effect to cause
‚ü∑
Within-time correlations (cov_w): Contemporaneous associations at each time point
=
Equality constraints: Same parameter value across time (improves power & parsimony)
